Wrong section to list stuff for ebay.. There is a designated place for ebay auction on bst...regards

[quote name="greenmonster66" post=897868]Wrong section to list stuff for ebay.. There is a designated place for ebay auction on bst...regards[/QUOTE]

 these are sale listings, not auctions. i'm not fond of selling on the bay, i would much rather sell to members of the board and i would have posted them on here but it's quicker for me to list them there. I own a metal business, i'm not a card dealer, only a private collector and i barely have time for it. i wish i had nothing better to do than sit here and give my opinion where members should post SALE listings, however thank you for your input forum guard :p regards

Wow. Really? You're playing that card?

It's simple. This is where you put these listings:

[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/forumdisplay.php?f=16[/url]

[quote name="broadhurstinc" post=897886]these are sale listings, not auctions. i'm not fond of selling on the bay, i would much rather sell to members of the board and i would have posted them on here but it's quicker for me to list them there. I own a metal business, i'm not a card dealer, only a private collector and i barely have time for it. i wish i had nothing better to do than sit here and give my opinion where members should post SALE listings, however thank you for your input forum guard :p regards[/QUOTE]

For those of you level headed members who i've had the pleasure of dealing with will allready know I'm not playing a "card" here. For those of you who don't, I don't know how to explain this any more clearly.. the cards are fixed price sale listings, NOT AUCTIONS, once board members have some time to pick up what they need i may chose down the road to auction the remaining cards off in which case i will post in the ebay auctions section which i am well aware of thank you... sorry if i don't have a dedicated card selling website like others here have who post links when they have cards available.. only a ebay store supscription i pay for every month and seldom use. these are all dupes and lower grades of my sgc registry set: [url]http://www.sgccardregistry.com/set.aspx?cat=1&set=239&userset=4491[/url] i would also be interested in trades for cards i need to complete or upgrade the set. i have approx 200 more sgc 40's and up i will be offering for sale or trade at fair prices to members of this board. Many of you know i am very easy going and reasonable but i have little patience for this bs so i am finished with these replies. If Scott or Leon feel that i am violating board rules here i will gladly resign from this forum. For the rest of you please keep your opinions and commision based website links to yourselves. 

Thank You,
Kristopher J. Lill

For the record I have dealt with Kris and consider him top notch in my book.
Good luck with the sales my friend....

             Very Best, Tony Andrea

Thanks for the good reference Tony and also for the wish of good luck in the sales 

Thanks,
Kris

btw i found 2 polar bear tobacco signs i forgot i had, not original's but would still display nicely in the man cave, i'm keeping one but i'll send you the other packed securely in an excessive amount of foam peanuts... :cool:
